basics.name: Noel Chen
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Hi, I'm Noel, an experienced web developer mainly using Ruby on Rails to create great product. I always keep my way toward the object that writes the clean and beautiful code to make people happier, and dying to dig out anything useful and meaningful to make life solid.

work.summary: The Easiest Online Shop Builder in Asia
highlights: Integrate with TCat to create objects that provide the utility to update delivery information and generate delivery order file.
Use Grape to build lightweight API for the third party and manage its library dependency by follow Rails style.
Use Doorkeeper to build customerized Auth Service to support the API that available for the public.
Use RSpec to write test for complicated logic such as order checkout or the function that needs the support from outside world.

work.summary: commandp is a start-up that helps individuals to create their own customized products such as phone case, t-shirt, and etc.
highlights: Use RJS and jQuery to build the internal system interface for admin and shop.
Use AASM to manage the status and activity of an order.
Build the utlity to manage kinds of price promotions.
Use Pundit to provide auth service to manage third party when using internal system.
Write RESTful API for mobile and front end.
Create kinds of service objects and form objects to support commercial needs.
Create daily task to dump requird data and display it with forms by C3.js.
Intergate with thrid party API like Stripe, Mailgun, SMS King, Zendesk, and Emay etc.
Write test for any kinds of backend utlity by following TDD.
Help and support front end developers to build universal javascript website from Rails.

work.summary: UrCosme is a SNS for cosme products
highlights: Create admin app for manage users, products, categories, and so on.
Create a channel BeautyBuizz for display highlights posts.
Create an internal app that generates customerized event sites.

volunteer.summary: Learn how web apps work at Ruby on Rails Workshop for Girls.
highlights: Experience a trip to lead people into Rails world.
